name: Void Spirit
title: Inai
lore: Inai guards the thin membrane between the mortal and spirit realms with void magic.

aetherRemnant.name: Aether Remnant
aetherRemnant.description: Creates a remnant that watches an area, pulling and damaging the first enemy.

dissimilate.name: Dissimilate
dissimilate.description: Void Spirit fades into the void, reappearing at a chosen portal to damage enemies.

resonantPulse.name: Resonant Pulse
resonantPulse.description: Emits a pulse that damages enemies and absorbs their damage into a shield.

astralStep.name: Astral Step
astralStep.description: Tears through reality, damaging enemies in a line and applying a slow.
